fr:mainmatter.fr:p: The key here is that control information flows in the opposite direction from measurement information. This dynamic will recur.

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: The Heuristic Control of Complex Systems

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: The key here is that control information flows in the opposite direction from measurement information. This dynamic will recur.
